en.title: 15 Tips for Living with Cat Allergies | How to Reduce Symptoms
en.content:
Even with cat allergies, proper measures can often significantly reduce symptoms. Here are 15 practical techniques you can try.

Space Management (5 Tips)

1. Keep cats out of the bedroom — preventing allergen exposure during sleep is the most important step. 2. Install HEPA filter air purifiers in each room. 3. Replace fabric sofas with leather or vinyl alternatives. 4. Replace carpeting with hardwood flooring. 5. Switch to washable curtains and launder them regularly.

Cleaning Techniques (5 Tips)

6. Vacuum daily with a HEPA filter vacuum cleaner. 7. Mop hardwood floors daily. 8. Wash bed covers and pillowcases weekly. 9. Remove cat hair from clothing with lint rollers. 10. Ventilate by opening windows regularly.

Cat Care (3 Tips)

11. Brush your cat 2–3 times per week (ideally by a non-allergic family member). 12. Wipe down your cat with a warm damp towel or bathe them 1–2 times per month. 13. Use allergen-reducing sprays or wipes.

Personal Measures (2 Tips)

14. Always wash your hands after touching your cat and avoid touching your face. 15. Consult an allergy specialist and take medication as needed.

You Don\'t Need to Do Everything Perfectly

You don\'t need to follow all 15 tips. Start with the most effective measures based on the severity of your symptoms. Many people achieve a comfortable life with cats by combining just a few of these strategies.

zh.title: 与猫过敏共处的15个技巧 | 减轻症状的生活方式
zh.content:
即使有猫过敏，通过适当的措施也能大幅减轻症状。以下介绍15个实用技巧。

空间管理（5个要点）

①不让猫进入卧室——防止睡眠时接触过敏原是最重要的。②在每个房间安装带HEPA滤芯的空气净化器。③将布艺沙发更换为皮革或人造革材质。④将地毯更换为硬质地板。⑤使用可水洗窗帘，定期清洗。

清洁技巧（5个要点）

⑥每天用带HEPA滤芯的吸尘器打扫。⑦每天擦拭硬质地板。⑧每周清洗床罩和枕套。⑨用粘毛器去除衣物上的猫毛。⑩定期开窗通风。

猫咪护理（3个要点）

⑪每周给猫梳毛2~3次（最好由没有过敏的家人负责）。⑫每月用温热湿毛巾擦拭或洗澡1~2次。⑬使用减少过敏原的喷雾或湿巾。

个人防护（2个要点）

⑭触摸猫后一定要洗手，避免触摸脸部。⑮咨询过敏专科医生，必要时服用药物。

不必追求完美

不需要全部执行15个技巧。根据自己的症状程度，从效果最好的措施开始逐步采用。很多人通过组合几种措施，就实现了与猫咪的舒适共处。
